name: Trick or Treat (Mike Murray)
description:
Trick or Treat was my first game for the Game Prototype Challenge game jam. It's a two-player game where the objective is to collect the most candy. Each costume has special abilities, and strengths and weaknesses. I really like this game, and would love to expand on it further by including AI opponents and allowing up to 4 players instead of just 2.

CONTROLS

SPACE - used to select a costume

WASD - used to move player 1

ARROWS - used to move player 2/moves cursor on select screen

C - activates Player 1's trick

RIGHT SHIFT - activates Player 2's trick
